channel.title: The Low HP Podcast
channel.description: Low HP is where we discuss gaming news, what we're currently playing, and thoughts on the gaming world in general.

item.title: 4: The Big Change In Pokémon
item.itunes:title: The Big Change In Pokémon
item.itunes:author: Hunter, Gerardo, Teresa
item.description: We discuss some of the changes that the main series of Pokémon games have taken over the years. From a pretty standard linear JRPG to a fully open world experience. Some of the changes and pitfalls they've made along the way, what they did right, and how the series can improve from here.
item.itunes:subtitle: We discuss some of the changes that the main series of Pokémon games have taken over the years. From a pretty standard linear JRPG to a fully open world experience. Some of the changes and pitfalls they've made along the way, what they did right, and how the series can improve from here.
item.itunes:summary: We discuss some of the changes that the main series of Pokémon games have taken over the years. From a pretty standard linear JRPG to a fully open world experience. Some of the changes and pitfalls they've made along the way, what they did right, and how the series can improve from here.
